levels.description: Small stash (10x30)
Medium stash (10x40)
Large stash (10x50)
Maximum size stash (10x68)
Home library with various fiction and popular science books and magazines.
A special box where specially hired Scavs drop off various items that they've found.
The Hall of Fame is a special rack where you can put your trophies and collectibles.
A great rack from IDEA that can very nicely hold all the figurines found in raids and several dogtags taken from PMCs.
A full-fledged area in the Hideout dedicated to storing items of collectible value.
Surface-mounted solar-wind batteries improve the overall Hideout power generation.
The moonshine still allows you to produce strong drinks directly in your Hideout.
A piece of a wall with swollen paint. Nothing serious, but it might become a problem soon.
A piece of wall with heavily swollen paint. Water is seeping from the wall. You definitely need to do something about it. Wipe the floor, maybe.
A piece of wall with heavily swollen paint. Part of the paint fell off. Water is seeping from the wall. There seems to be something behind this wall.
A wall with a hidden door. You don't know who made it and why, but to open it, you will need tools. Also, another wipe wouldn't hurt.
The damaged part of the wall turned out to be an entrance to the old hidden room. There is nothing inside but rubbish and a dead body. It will take a lot of effort to put this room in shape.
A tidied up entrance to the new room.
A small weapon rack. Simplifies firearm storage and allows to display weapons in a fancy way.
A medium-sized weapon rack. Simplifies firearm storage and allows to display weapons in a fancy way.
A large weapon rack. Simplifies firearm storage and allows to display weapons in a fancy way.
A mannequin with a weapon rack. Allows you to prepare a set of equipment for the raid.
With two mannequins, you can not only prepare gear for a raid, but also display something cool and rare. Would look great.
Several mannequins with a weapon rack. With a wardrobe like this, it will be easy to store quick access gear for any occasion.
A well-equipped gym to keep your body in good physical shape.
Air filtration system, connected to the common ventilation system. It provides the air which is as cleanest from harmful impurities as possible.

If the generator is the heart of the Hideout, then the intelligence center is its brain. For now, this is just an old table and chair for analyzing various information that can help you escape from Tarkov.

An advanced intelligence center equipped with a laptop, which has more working space due to an additional table. Thanks to Mechanic, it is connected to an isolated computer network, which remained intact after the EMP strike and isolation of Tarkov.
A full-fledged intelligence center equipped with computer equipment, radio devices and analytical tools. The escape from Tarkov was never so close.
A circle drawn in chalk and cluttered with mysterious symbols. Such circles are used by the cultists for their rituals. One wonders what would happen if you put something in the middle of it...?
A simple barrel with firewood to maintain heat. A very basic option for heating. Dangerous because of toxic carbon monoxide.

A potbelly stove is a metal stove for interior heating, popular in the first half of the 20th century. An irreplaceable thing in the Hideout, especially when connected to the ventilation system for the output of combustion products.
Equips the entire Hideout with additional electric heaters. Now, together with the potbelly stove, you won't be afraid of any cold.
A simple fuel generator that can provide basic Hideout equipment with electricity. The heart of your shelter. Fuel is needed to maintain the working power grid.
A superior high power generator. It allows you to use a wider range of electrical appliances. Provides additional slots for installing fuel cans.
Industrial generator to ensure the autonomous operation of production facilities. Also provides additional slots for installing fuel cans.

Ventilation duct suspended from the ceiling. The air duct passes through part of the room, providing the natural movement of air flows. It is necessary for the installation of "smoky" zones where the output of combustion products is required.
A basic ventilation duct with additional emergency bunker ventilation system of external airflow. Now, besides the removal of combustion products, there will be fresh air in the Hideout.
A ventilation duct fitted with electric fans to increase the airflow rate. A complete air circulation system is needed for advanced production and chemical research.
A basic front door. So that all kinds of fools don't come to pay you a visit. It does not save from drafts and moisture, but it creates the feeling that the Hideout is slowly getting settled.
An improved entrance hall with a reinforced door, a clothes hanger, and other household items. Cant kick such a door down with just a single kick.

An advanced Hideout security system which includes, in addition to an armored bunker door, a video surveillance camera, an intercom system, fire extinguishers, as well as special ties to increase the structural strength of walls and ceiling.
A primitive toilet. Any amenities are out of the question. Just a bucket and a litter box to maintain basic sanitation in the Hideout.

bonuses.name: Unlocks armor repair via repair kits

levels.description: A basic bathroom with a wooden outhouse type toilet and a washstand, connected to the water supply system. All this raises the level of cleanliness and hygiene in the Hideout.

bonuses.name: Reduces armor repair cost using repair kits

item.name: MSA ACH TC-2002 MICH Series helmet (Olive Drab)
Ars Arma A18 Skanda plate carrier (MultiCam)

levels.description: An advanced bathroom with a dry closet, a shower and a trash can. Everything you need is connected to the water supply system and provides the most affordable level of personal hygiene.

bonuses.name: Reduces armor repair cost using repair kits

levels.description: Basic water system for collecting groundwater. Contains several water filters and containers for water purification. One of the most important systems for maintaining life support in the Hideout.

A sophisticated water collection system with additional pipes, filters, and larger containers. Installation of pumps allows to improve the pressure in the pipes and, consequently, the pressure of water.

An advanced water collection system for both groundwater and rainwater. It contains various cleaning filters, an electric pump and an extensive water supply system throughout the Hideout. An additional filtration and enrichment system allows you to get very clean and high-quality water.
The continued availability of medication means greater chances of survival after raids. Several medical storage boxes for basic medical care.
A medical unit consisting of a table for medicine, a chair and a dropper. The healing process will be faster while you are out of raids.
A full-fledged Hideout medical laboratory. It has everything you need to treat wounds, create medicines and maintain your good health during these difficult times.

item.name: AFAK tactical individual first aid kit

levels.description: Food in the Hideout provides you with energy for future raids. A basic nutrition unit with an old fridge and a place to eat allows you to recover your energy faster.

item.name: Can of Max Energy energy drink
Bottle of Norvinsky Yadreniy premium kvass (0.6L)

levels.description: A nutrition unit with a more modern refrigerator, dining accessories, stove and sink, providing better food. Energy is restored faster.

A full-fledged kitchen with a comfortable stove, an improved sink, an electric kettle, a microwave and everything necessary for fast and high-quality food cooking outside raids. Cant violate the diet!

item.name: Can of Hot Rod energy drink

levels.description: Rest is very important, especially in the besieged Tarkov environment. A mattress over pallets is the very basic thing which can help PMCs relax after hard battles.
A place to relax, equipped with a normal bed, bedside table and even an old TV. It creates a feeling of comfort and gives nostalgic memories of a former life.

A lounge area with a sofa, an LCD TV with a Ployka Station console and a stereo system. It is hard to imagine that such comfort can be organized in an underground bunker when the whole world flies into the abyss.
Everybody needs a place to work with their tools. A simple workbench allows you to do the basic modifications of your weapon and disassembling various technical parts.

bonuses.name: Unlocks weapon repair via repair kits

levels.description: A workplace equipped with everything necessary for the production of simple ammunition and more complex technical tasks required to improve your hideout.

bonuses.name: Reduces weapon repair cost using repair kits

levels.description: A full-fledged table of the gunsmithing master. It allows you to produce more advanced cartridges and engage in high-tech tasks, assembly and disassembly of complex electronic devices and mechanical systems.

bonuses.name: Reduces weapon repair cost using repair kits

levels.description: A specially equipped place for shooting firearms. For the convenience of evaluating the shooting results, the range is equipped with metal silhouette popper targets for the close range, and paper targets for the long range.
An improved range with installed ceiling-mounted target rails with three speed levels.

An advanced shooting range with installed popper targets and a laptop for configuration. Also allows to start training with random rail targets and poppers, scores are displayed on the laptop monitor.
Basic lighting with paraffin candles, giving a dim and uneven light.
Hideout lighting with incandescent bulbs. The illumination is more even and brighter than from the candles.
Hideout lighting with fluorescent lights provides optimal brightness and uniformity of illumination.
Basic bitcoin farm of 10 units. Using the computing power of graphics cards, you can use the system to produce physical bitcoins.
An improved bitcoin farm of 25 units. Using the computing power of graphics cards, you can use the system to produce physical bitcoins.
Maximum size bitcoin farm for 50 units with water cooling. Using the computing power of graphics cards, you can use the system to produce physical bitcoins.
